title: The amazing (an deadly) meeting between a rat and a Thompson

embed.description: That's only when i saw the Rat shooting in the mass with his Thompson that i understood the painful truth: never let an animal watches "The Godfather", that could inspires them... Or me...

body:
Rat, cheese and every disease. This was the ingredients chosen to create the perfect adc, but Riot decided to put one more thing: the Thompson. And believe me, after his passage, there is only passing ! Or maybe it is the opposite? Anyway, he makes his own rule through the Rift: no rule allowed. But this is only true when everything is good, because the Rift easily take the time to make him remember that we're in 2017, and in 2017, there is no Thompson firstly, and adc have to be really careful  ! Then take a seat and appreciate this vintage footage about a Rat and his lovely tommy gun, containing false pentakills, true escape, false true skill but true false damages !

Oh and please, before I forget, leave a feedback, that helps me to keep doing this kind of stuff, and that helps you to stay alive... Rat lurks...

replies.body: Subbed and loved, that was the good shit. keep it up bud
